com.paypal.paypalretailsdk

Class TransactionBeginOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • PayPalRetailObject
      • com.paypal.paypalretailsdk.TransactionBeginOptions

  • public class TransactionBeginOptions
extends PayPalRetailObject
    TransactionOptions provides the list of customizations for a given transaction

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TransactionBeginOptions()
      Create transaction options object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Boolean getAmountBasedTipping()
      Set the flag if the amount based tipping type used, otherwise, percentage based used
      java.lang.Boolean getIsAuthCapture()
      Setting this to true will only authorize the transaction and a payment will NOT be taken.
      java.util.List<FormFactor> getPreferredFormFactors()
      Use this property to set the preferred list of form factors for the transaction.
      java.lang.Boolean getShowPromptInApp()
      Show a payment prompt in-app to indicate that the customer/cahsier should insert, swipe or tap a card
      java.lang.Boolean getShowPromptInCardReader()
      Show a payment prompt on the card reader's screen (if available) to indicate that the customer/cashier should insert, swipe or tap a card
      java.lang.Boolean getTippingOnReaderEnabled()
      Set the flag if the tipping on the reader is enabled
      void setAmountBasedTipping(java.lang.Boolean value)
      Set the flag if the amount based tipping type used, otherwise, percentage based used
      void setIsAuthCapture(java.lang.Boolean value)
      Setting this to true will only authorize the transaction and a payment will NOT be taken.
      void setPreferredFormFactors(java.util.List<FormFactor> value)
      Use this property to set the preferred list of form factors for the transaction.
      void setShowPromptInApp(java.lang.Boolean value)
      Show a payment prompt in-app to indicate that the customer/cahsier should insert, swipe or tap a card
      void setShowPromptInCardReader(java.lang.Boolean value)
      Show a payment prompt on the card reader's screen (if available) to indicate that the customer/cashier should insert, swipe or tap a card
      void setTippingOnReaderEnabled(java.lang.Boolean value)
      Set the flag if the tipping on the reader is enabled
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representing the serialized state of the TransactionBeginOptions object

      • getShowPromptInCardReader

        public java.lang.Boolean getShowPromptInCardReader()
        Show a payment prompt on the card reader's screen (if available) to indicate that the customer/cashier should insert, swipe or tap a card

        Show a payment prompt on the card reader's screen (if available) to indicate that the customer/cashier should insert, swipe or tap a card

        Show a payment prompt in-app to indicate that the customer/cahsier should insert, swipe or tap a card

        Show a payment prompt in-app to indicate that the customer/cahsier should insert, swipe or tap a card

      • getPreferredFormFactors

        public java.util.List<FormFactor> getPreferredFormFactors()
        Use this property to set the preferred list of form factors for the transaction. The actual list of form factors that will be used for a transaction will be an intersection of available form factors and preferred list

      • setPreferredFormFactors

        public void setPreferredFormFactors(java.util.List<FormFactor> value)
        Use this property to set the preferred list of form factors for the transaction. The actual list of form factors that will be used for a transaction will be an intersection of available form factors and preferred list

      • getTippingOnReaderEnabled

        public java.lang.Boolean getTippingOnReaderEnabled()
        Set the flag if the tipping on the reader is enabled

      • setTippingOnReaderEnabled

        public void setTippingOnReaderEnabled(java.lang.Boolean value)
        Set the flag if the tipping on the reader is enabled

      • getAmountBasedTipping

        public java.lang.Boolean getAmountBasedTipping()
        Set the flag if the amount based tipping type used, otherwise, percentage based used

      • setAmountBasedTipping

        public void setAmountBasedTipping(java.lang.Boolean value)
        Set the flag if the amount based tipping type used, otherwise, percentage based used

      • getIsAuthCapture

        public java.lang.Boolean getIsAuthCapture()
        Setting this to true will only authorize the transaction and a payment will NOT be taken. The money will be moved only when a capture call is made on an authorized transaction.

      • setIsAuthCapture

        public void setIsAuthCapture(java.lang.Boolean value)
        Setting this to true will only authorize the transaction and a payment will NOT be taken. The money will be moved only when a capture call is made on an authorized transaction.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representing the serialized state of the TransactionBeginOptions object
